snippet: ROTKOWITZ--Sy. The Officers, Board of Governors, The Women's Group, Members and Staff of The Muttontown Club mourn the passing of our beloved member, Sy Rotkowitz and extend our sincerest condolences to his wife Linda, his children and their families. Robert Sherman, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROTKOWITZ--Sy. The Officers, Board of Governors, The Women's Group, Members and Staff of The Muttontown Club mourn the passing of our beloved member, Sy Rotkowitz and extend our sincerest condolences to his wife Linda, his children and their families. Robert Sherman, President 1/3
